title: Setting position of model via commandline causes Gazebo to crash when using Dart.

content.raw:
I have this one world file that crashes whenever I try to call


```
gz joint -m "default_body" -j hingejoint0 --pos-t 1.5

```

and complains about ODE Solver which is weird because I am using Dart. Here is the stack trace 

```
ODE Message 3: LCP internal error, s <= 0 (s=-1.4094e-14)

ODE INTERNAL ERROR 1: assertion "d[i] != dReal(0.0)" failed in _dLDLTRemove() [/build/buildd/dart-4.3.4/dart/lcpsolver/matrix.cpp:404]

```

and last but not least I have attached the SDF file.
